verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> to you, <S%H1004><s%> house of Israel! <S%H3478><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Don't <S%H3925><s%> learn the way <S%H1870><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and don't <S%H2865><s%> be dismayed at the signs <S%H226><s%> of the sky; <S%H8064><s%> for the nations <S%H1471><s%> are dismayed <S%H2865><s%> at them. <S%H1992><s%>

For the customs <S%H2708><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> are vanity; <S%H1892><s%> for one cuts <S%H3772><s%> a tree <S%H6086><s%> out of the forest, <S%H3293><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the workman <S%H2796><s%> with the axe. <S%H4621><s%>
They deck <S%H3302><s%> it with silver <S%H3701><s%> and with gold; <S%H2091><s%> they fasten <S%H2388><s%> it with nails <S%H4548><s%> and with hammers, <S%H4717><s%> that it not move. <S%H6328><s%>

They are like <S%H4749><s%> a palm tree, <S%H8560><s%> of turned work, <S%H1696><s%> and don't speak: they must <S%H5375><s%> be carried, <S%H5375><s%> because they can't <S%H6805><s%> go. Don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid of them; <S%H7489><s%> for they can't do evil, neither is it in them to do good. <S%H3190><s%>"
There is none like you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh; you are great, <S%H1419><s%> and your name <S%H8034><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> in might. <S%H1369><s%>

Who should not fear <S%H3372><s%> you, <S%H4428><s%> King of the nations? <S%H1471><s%> For it appertains <S%H2969><s%> to you; <S%H2450><s%> because among all the wise men of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and in all their royal estate, <S%H4438><s%> there is none like you.
But they are together <S%H259><s%> brutish <S%H1197><s%> and foolish: <S%H3688><s%> the instruction <S%H4148><s%> of idols! <S%H6086><s%> it is but a stock. <S%H6086><s%>

There is silver <S%H3701><s%> beaten into plates, <S%H7554><s%> which is brought <S%H935><s%> from Tarshish, <S%H8659><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%> from Uphaz, <S%H210><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of the artificer <S%H2796><s%> and of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the goldsmith; <S%H6884><s%> blue <S%H8504><s%> and purple <S%H713><s%> for their clothing; <S%H3830><s%> they are all the work <S%H4639><s%> of skillful men. <S%H2450><s%>

But Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is the true <S%H571><s%> God; <S%H430><s%> he is the living <S%H2416><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> King: <S%H4428><s%> at his wrath <S%H7110><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> trembles, <S%H7493><s%> and the nations <S%H1471><s%> are not able to withstand <S%H3557><s%> his indignation. <S%H2195><s%>

You <S%H1836><s%> shall say <S%H560><s%> this to them: <S%H426><s%> The gods that have not <S%H3809><s%> made <S%H5648><s%> the heavens <S%H8065><s%> and the earth, <S%H778><s%> these shall perish <S%H7><s%> from the earth, <S%H772><s%> and from under <S%H8460><s%> the <S%H429><s%> heavens. <S%H8065><s%>

He has made <S%H6213><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> by his power, <S%H3581><s%> he has established <S%H3559><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> by his wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and by his understanding <S%H2451><s%> has he stretched out <S%H5186><s%> the heavens: <S%H8064><s%>

when he utters <S%H5414><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> there is a tumult <S%H1995><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> in the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and he causes the vapors <S%H5387><s%> to ascend <S%H5927><s%> from the ends <S%H7097><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> he makes <S%H6213><s%> lightnings <S%H1300><s%> for the rain, <S%H4306><s%> and brings forth <S%H3318><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%> out of his treasuries. <S%H214><s%>

Every man <S%H120><s%> has become brutish <S%H1197><s%> and without knowledge; <S%H1847><s%> every goldsmith <S%H6884><s%> is disappointed <S%H3001><s%> by his engraved image; <S%H6459><s%> for his molten image <S%H5262><s%> is falsehood, <S%H8267><s%> and there is no breath in them. <S%H7307><s%>
They are vanity, <S%H1892><s%> a work <S%H4639><s%> of delusion: <S%H8595><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of their visitation <S%H6486><s%> they shall perish. <S%H6><s%>

The portion <S%H2506><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is not like these; <S%H3335><s%> for he is the former of all things; <S%H3478><s%> and Israel is the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of his inheritance: <S%H5159><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> is his name. <S%H8034><s%>
Gather up <S%H622><s%> your wares <S%H3666><s%> out of the land, <S%H776><s%> you who live <S%H3427><s%> under siege. <S%H4692><s%>

For thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H7049><s%> I will sling out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> at this time, <S%H6471><s%> and will distress <S%H6887><s%> them, <S%H4672><s%> that they may feel it.

Woe <S%H188><s%> is me because of my hurt! <S%H7667><s%> my wound <S%H4347><s%> is grievous: <S%H2470><s%> but I said, <S%H559><s%> Truly <S%H389><s%> this is my grief, <S%H2483><s%> and I must bear it. <S%H5375><s%>

My tent <S%H168><s%> is destroyed, <S%H7703><s%> and all my cords <S%H4340><s%> are broken: <S%H5423><s%> my children <S%H1121><s%> are gone forth <S%H3318><s%> from me, <S%H5186><s%> and they are no more: there is none to spread my tent <S%H168><s%> any more, <S%H6965><s%> and to set up my curtains. <S%H3407><s%>

For the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> are become brutish, <S%H1197><s%> and have not inquired <S%H1875><s%> of Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> therefore they have not prospered, <S%H7919><s%> and all their flocks <S%H4830><s%> are scattered. <S%H6327><s%>

The voice <S%H6963><s%> of news, <S%H8052><s%> behold, <S%H935><s%> it comes, and a great <S%H1419><s%> commotion <S%H7494><s%> out of the north <S%H6828><s%> country, <S%H776><s%> to make <S%H7760><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> a desolation, <S%H8077><s%> a dwelling <S%H4583><s%> place of jackals. <S%H8577><s%>

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that the way <S%H1870><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> is not in himself: <S%H376><s%> it is not in man who walks <S%H1980><s%> to direct <S%H3559><s%> his steps. <S%H6806><s%>
Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> correct <S%H3256><s%> me, <S%H4941><s%> but in measure: not in your anger, <S%H639><s%> lest you bring me to nothing. <S%H4591><s%>

Pour out <S%H8210><s%> your wrath <S%H2534><s%> on the nations <S%H1471><s%> that don't <S%H3045><s%> know you, <S%H4940><s%> and on the families that don't <S%H7121><s%> call on your name: <S%H8034><s%> for they have devoured <S%H398><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> yes, <S%H398><s%> they have devoured him and consumed <S%H3615><s%> him, <S%H8074><s%> and have laid waste his habitation. <S%H5116><s%>
